Text.Page:
Friend, the Enlightened Union has need of you.

Our spies in the lands controlled by the Iron Order have reported troubling rumors, suggesting they might be planning to employ some of the local beasts to use as shock troops against us.

This requires further investigation. Please enter the order's territory and slay a few {@linkcreature:123#202#Darkquaver mugatos} and {@linkcreature:123#205#river ghilliedhus}, and return with your findings.
You have performed exceptionallyâ€”and for that, my friend, the Enlightened Union is in your debt!
